casebody.data:
TEXAS, et al., Petitioners,
v.
CALIFORNIA, et al. No. 19-1019 Supreme Court of the United States. March 2, 2020

Motion of 33 State Hospital Associations for leave to file a brief as amici curiae in No. 19-840 granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit granted. The case is consolidated and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
